formatted_address: C0110, Block C, Eko Galleria, 3, Persiaran Eko Botani, Taman Eko Botani, 79100 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Jaya Grocer Eco Galleria

reviews.text: The best grocery in Johor, from fruits and vegetables to meats and ice creams, also they carry a lot of imported international ingredients. They also have a non halal section that has Pork meats and alcoholic beverages.
Huge supermarket. Clean and big, nice to walk. Stuff are relatively more expensive than other supermarkets. Many brands, wide variety. Quite crowded esp in the evening

Nice place but would be better to open earlier on weekends. 950 am and many customers already waiting. Can open 9am? In fact survey , your customer to find out what time they prefer. Not asking for 24hrs but many like to go grocery early on weekends. Thanks

Spacious, well organised and well stocked with intentional and local produce. Such a great experience grocery shopping here. I especially like their pre-packed herbs, tea and spices in a local section. Wallet friendly, clear instructions and with health benefits stated too.

Nice new place. Lots of activities happening around. Definitely an awesome shopping experience. From fresh fruits to fresh seafood. Many varieties. Am amazed with the Australian section, with lots of Aussie snacks and drinks. Brought back to my shopping experience in Australia. This will be my go to grocery shopping area. Prices are not so bad compared to Aeon. Less crowded too.

vicinity: C0110, Block C, Eko Galleria, 3, Persiaran Eko Botani, Taman Eko Botani, Iskandar Puteri
